pt.ua.tm.neji.annotator

Class Annotator

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ua.tm.neji.annotator.Annotator

  • public class Annotator
extends Object
    Class used to annotate any Corpus using one or several CRFModel trained by Gimli.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    David Campos (david.campos@ua.pt)
